decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):

Cover Letter, PR-001-G-Approved Site Plan, PR-103-G-Approved Second Floor, PR-G-Approved Roof Plan, PR-200-G-Approved Front Elevation, PR-201-G-Approved Side Elevation, PR-G-Approved Rear Elevation, PR-300-G-Approved Section AA, PR-G-Approved Section BB, PR-304-G-Approved Section EE, PR-001-H-Proposed Site Plan, PR-103-I-Proposed Second Floor, PR-104-Proposed Roof Plan, PR-200-H-Front Elevation, PR-201-H-Proposed Side Elevation, PR-202-Proposed Rear Elevation, PR-300-H-Proposed Section AA, PR-301-H-Proposed Section BB, PR-304-H-Proposed Section EE
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow to remove the external terrace on Unit 5 to create additional internal space and to install two windows in the front gables at second floor level, in relation to planning permission reference 205285FUL (Appeal ref. APP/A5270/W/22/3305443) dated  22/05/2023 for 'Conversion of existing building containing 3 self-contained flats into 5 self-contained flats; incorporating a single storey rear extension; part single, part two and part three-storey side extension (following demolition of existing side extension and garage); rear roof extension; installation of four rooflights to front roofslope; and provision of associated private amenity space, including terraces/balconies at first and second floor levels, landscaping, refuse storage and external alterations (Amended plans) '
